titleStmt.title: Letters of intercommuning against persons declared fugitives for not compearing to answer for conventicles, &c.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Gibson, Alexander, Sir, d. 1693.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the sixth day of August, one thousand six hundred seventy and five years, and of Our Reign, the twenty seventh year.
Signed: Al. Gibson, Cl. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
